build.buildCommand: cd frontend/backend && apt-get update && ACCEPT_EULA=Y apt-get install -y unixodbc-dev && curl https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/microsoft.asc && curl https://packages.microsoft.com/config/debian/11/prod.list | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mssql-release.list && apt-get update && ACCEPT_EULA=Y apt-get install -y msodbcsql17 && pip install -r requirements.txt

deploy.startCommand: cd frontend/backend && python init_railway_db.py && python app.py
